Public Remarks: Potentially subdividable, this 317 acre parcel is situated about 23 kilometers NW of Smithers. Great south and west exposure gives lots of sunshine, and soil survey indicates black loam. Enjoy sweeping views of Hudson Bay Mountain Range and Kathlyn Glacier. Seasonal creeks on property, some replanted forest and some marketable timber. Plenty of wildlife, and close to the Bulkley River for fishing. This property is not in the Agricultural Land Reserve (ALR). It is zoned RR1, and could be subdivided into four pieces of 69 acres each. The RR1 zoning allows for a variety of uses, including two single-family dwellings, or four seasonal dwellings, a guest ranch, intensive agriculture, mining, airstrip, or outdoor recreation facility.
